hero.text: Experiences know no boundaries. Thatâ€™s why AJSEE was born.
hero.subtext: Our goal is to make cultural, entertainment, and sports events from around the world accessible â€“ clearly, understandably, and without unnecessary barriers when choosing and purchasing tickets.
hero.claim: AJSEE<sup>Â®</sup> is a modern platform for everyone who wants to experience the world to the fullest â€“ without obstacles.

story.headline: How it all began
story.p1: It was autumn 2024. We were sitting in a pub, having a beer â€“ and as it happens, one ordinary conversation sparked something that soon turned into a real idea.
story.p2: That same evening, the name AJSEE, the first logo draft, and the vision were born: to make global experiences accessible without language barriers.
story.p3: Then came the hardest part: to actually start.
story.p4: We both had full-time jobs, lived 180 kilometers apart, and time was short. The project stalled before it could even get going.
story.p5: Until one day, one of us just launched it. Without a perfect plan, but with the certainty that it made sense. And thatâ€™s when AJSEE started becoming real.

future.headline: ðŸŽ¯ Where we're heading
future.p1: We aim to launch the production version of the website by the end of 2025.
future.p2: We're expanding language versions and partnering with international platforms.
future.p3: We're preparing a mobile app and broadening the range of events as well as their accessibility for a wider audience.
future.p4: We want AJSEE to be the first choice for anyone seeking world-class experiences â€” whether in London, Barcelona, or at home in Brno.
